thread.title: NFL players react to the Browns' huge free agency haul
thread.title_full: NFL players react to the Browns' huge free agency haul

title: NFL players react to the Browns' huge free agency haul
text:
Mar 9, 2017 at 5:07p ET 0Shares 
The Cleveland Browns made some big moves on the first day of the NFL's new year, rebuilding their offensive line by reportedly signing free agents JC Tretter and Kevin Zeitler, as well as signing Joel Bitonio to a five-year extension. 
Cleveland is also set to welcome wide receiver Kenny Britt , and while it's still unclear who will be the starting quarterback by Week 1, the Browns agreed to a stunning trade to acquire Brock Osweiler from the Texans (along with a second-round draft pick). The team is expected to cut Osweiler if they cannot find a team willing to trade for him. 
Although the Osweiler deal was polarizing, the Browns certainly got the attention of the rest of the league Thursday. Here's what current and former NFL players were saying about the Browns' moves:
